actions.name: Delta Stream

cost.trigger: The user enters combat or when the user gains this Ability.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters combat or when the user gains this Ability.

Effect: The Weather is changed to Intense Winds. When the user gains @Affliction[fainted] or switches out the weather will change to Windy for 5 rounds.
